trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base for classes that present content from another technology as part of an interoperation scenario.
trans-unit.target: 提供将其他技术的内容呈现为互操作方案的一部分的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this class provides static methods for working with these sources, as well as the basic visual-layer presentation architecture.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此类还提供用于处理这些源的静态方法，以及基本可视层表示体系结构。

trans-unit.source: to derive from this class.
trans-unit.target: 若要从此类派生。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在由派生类的构造函数调用时，提供基类值的初始化。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> derived class instance to the list of known presentation sources.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> 派生类实例添加到已知表示源的列表中。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called by derived classes to indicate that they need to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: 由派生类，以指示它们需要进行跟踪，应调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The element to add the handler to.
trans-unit.target: 向其添加处理程序的元素。

trans-unit.source: The hander implementation to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <see langword="SourceChanged" /> event to the provided element.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see langword="SourceChanged" /> 事件的处理程序添加到提供的元素中。

trans-unit.source: Despite what the syntax block for this event states, there is no legitimate [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] attached property usage.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此事件的语法块的状态，都不存在合法[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]附加属性的用法。

trans-unit.source: You should not attempt to add handlers in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], and handlers in code should only be placed on objects that serve as hosts for presentation (<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource> ) content.
trans-unit.target: 不应尝试添加处理程序中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，并在代码中的处理程序应仅将其置于用作演示文稿的主机的对象 (<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource> ) 内容。

trans-unit.source: Such handlers should only be attached during object initialization, and should be explicitly removed in a Dispose method or equivalent object cleanup.
trans-unit.target: 此类处理程序仅应在对象初始化期间附加，应显式删除中的 Dispose 方法或等效对象清理。

trans-unit.source: Even though this is a routed event, there are special restrictions placed on this event that differ from normal routed event behavior, due to the relatively small number of elements in a typical application scenario that would concern themselves with handling this event.
trans-unit.target: 即使这是路由的事件时，有特殊限制在此事件上放置，不同于常规的路由的事件的行为，由于自己考虑处理这一个典型应用场景中的元素的相对较小数目事件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A> methods to add handlers.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement><xref:System.Windows.UIElement.AddHandler%2A>添加处理程序的方法。

trans-unit.source: You must use <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cshrp](~/includes/tlasharptla-cshrp-md.md)] `+=` and `-=` event handler syntaxes, and related language specific handler syntaxes, are not supported, because the event itself is not exposed as public.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cshrp](~/includes/tlasharptla-cshrp-md.md)] `+=`和`-=`事件处理程序语法以及相关的语言特定的处理程序语法，不支持，因为事件本身未公开为公共。

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource> utility methods for adding and removing the handlers directly are supported.
trans-unit.target: 仅<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>实用工具方法，用于添加和移除处理，直接支持。

trans-unit.source: Class handlers are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允许类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, you cannot call <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A> against this event in a class constructor because although an identifier field exists for SourceChanged, the identifier is not public.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，不能调用<xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>类构造函数中的此事件针对因为虽然为 SourceChanged 存在标识符字段，但该标识符不是公共。

trans-unit.source: All registered handlers will receive the SourceChanged event even if one of the handlers attempts to mark the arguments as handled.
trans-unit.target: 所有已注册处理程序将收到该 SourceChanged 事件，即使其中一个处理程序尝试将参数标记为已处理。

trans-unit.source: to call or implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调用或实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the list of listeners for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.PresentationSource.ContentRendered" /> event to <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="E:System.Windows.PresentationSource.ContentRendered" /> 事件的侦听器列表设置为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the visual target for the visuals being presented in the source.
trans-unit.target: 获取要在源中显示的视觉效果的可视目标。

trans-unit.source: A visual target (instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CompositionTarget" /> derived class).
trans-unit.target: 可视目标（<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CompositionTarget" /> 派生类的实例）。

trans-unit.source: The return of this property relies on an implementation of <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.GetCompositionTargetCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回依赖于实现<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.GetCompositionTargetCore%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can choose to shadow this property to offer a type-specific value.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以选择隐藏此属性以提供特定类型的值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content is rendered and ready for user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 在呈现内容并准备开始用户交互时发生。

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of sources.
trans-unit.target: 返回源的列表。

trans-unit.source: A list of weak references.
trans-unit.target: 弱引用的列表。

trans-unit.source: The returned list supports an enumerator over a read-only, thread-safe copy of the list of sources as added with <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的列表支持枚举器的只读的线程安全副本的源的列表添加与<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSource%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator skips any dead weak references in the list.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数将跳过列表中的任何死弱引用。

trans-unit.source: to get sources.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取源。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> to find the source for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找其源的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the source in which a provided <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> is presented.
trans-unit.target: 返回要在其中呈现所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyObject" /> 的源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> in which the dependency object is being presented.
trans-unit.target: 要在其中显示依赖项对象的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: to call or implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调用或实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> to find the source for.
trans-unit.target: 要查找其源的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the source in which a provided <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> is presented.
trans-unit.target: 返回要在其中呈现所提供的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 的源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> in which the visual is being presented, or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="visual" /> is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 正在其中呈现视觉效果的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />；如果释放 <paramref name="visual" />，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="visual" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="visual" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: to call or implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要调用或实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a visual target for the given source.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写后，返回给定源的可视目标。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CompositionTarget" /> that is target for rendering the visual.
trans-unit.target: 返回呈现该视觉效果的目标 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CompositionTarget" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to declare the value that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.PresentationSource.CompositionTarget" /> read-only property will return.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以声明值的<see cref="P:System.Windows.PresentationSource.CompositionTarget" />只读属性将返回。

trans-unit.source: Your override should return type-specific instances of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CompositionTarget" /> derived class type that is used for your interoperation scenario.
trans-unit.target: 重写应返回特定类型的实例<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CompositionTarget" />派生类类型是用于互操作方案。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value that declares whether the object is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写后，获取一个声明对象是否已被释放的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object is disposed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果释放对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes are expected to implement <see cref="T:System.IDisposable" /> or provide equivalent behavior.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类需要实现<see cref="T:System.IDisposable" />或提供等效的行为。

trans-unit.source: Removes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> derived class instance from the list of known presentation sources.
trans-unit.target: 从已知表示源的列表中移除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> 派生类实例。

trans-unit.source: The element to remove the handler from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中移除处理程序的元素。

trans-unit.source: The handler implementation to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: Removes a handler for the <see langword="SourceChanged" /> event from the provided element.
trans-unit.target: 从所提供的元素中移除 <see langword="SourceChanged" /> 事件的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Even though this is a routed event, there are special restrictions placed on this event that differ from normal routed event behavior, due to the relatively small number of elements in a typical application scenario that would concern themselves with handling this event.
trans-unit.target: 即使这是路由的事件时，有特殊限制在此事件上放置，不同于常规的路由的事件的行为，由于自己考虑处理这一个典型应用场景中的元素的相对较小数目事件。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RemoveHandler%2A> methods to remove handlers.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement><xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RemoveHandler%2A>方法来移除处理程序。

trans-unit.source: You must use <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cshrp](~/includes/tlasharptla-cshrp-md.md)] `+=` and `-=` event handler syntaxes, and other language specific handler syntaxes, are not supported, because the event itself is not exposed as public.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_cshrp](~/includes/tlasharptla-cshrp-md.md)] `+=`和`-=`事件处理程序语法和其他语言特定的处理程序语法，不支持，因为事件本身未公开为公共。

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource> utility methods for adding and removing the handlers directly are supported.
trans-unit.target: 仅<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>实用工具方法，用于添加和移除处理，直接支持。

trans-unit.source: The old root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />.
trans-unit.target: 旧的根 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: The new root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的根 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" />。

trans-unit.source: Provides notification that the root <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: 提供根 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Visual" /> 已发生更改的通知。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should call this method to indicate that their root <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> has changed.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类应调用此方法，则指示其根<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>已更改。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method causes two object lifetime events to be raised on the specified root visuals, if and only if those root visuals are <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法会导致两个要对指定的根视觉对象，引发的对象生存期事件，当且仅当这些根视觉对象是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>派生类。

trans-unit.source: The old root visual will raise the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded> event, and will process its tree of elements downward, broadcasting this event to each child element.
trans-unit.target: 旧的根视觉效果将引发<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Unloaded>事件，并将处理其元素树的下跌，广播到每个子元素的此事件。

trans-unit.source: The new root visual will raise the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event, and will process its tree of elements downward, broadcasting this event to each child element.
trans-unit.target: 新根视觉效果将引发<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>事件，并将处理其元素树的下跌，广播到每个子元素的此事件。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the root visual being presented in the source.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写后，获取或设置要在源中显示的根视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: The root visual.
trans-unit.target: 根视觉效果。

trans-unit.source: to override the property (<see langword="InheritanceDemand" />).
trans-unit.target: 若要重写的属性 (<see langword="InheritanceDemand" />)。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />.
trans-unit.target: 关联枚举：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />。
